Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2009 06:09AM iamgiggles1 wrote: Hey all of you wonderful people. I start my chemo Thursday and it is starting to hit me now. I am getting worried about getting my kids back and forth to school and getting to my job. Can anyone help me out and tell me your experience with chemo please. I think the more I am ready for the better, so I can make plans for it. I will be on Taxotere, Carboplatin and Herceptin. Please give me some heads up on side effects that you had. Thank you again for all the wonderful advice and love!!
Posts.Title: OMG PLEASE HELP! iamgiggles1 cbm

Posts.Content: Sep 17, 2009 03:42PM iamgiggles1 wrote: Hey everyone, I wanted to let you all know I had my pet/ct today and will get all my results in the morning. I have surgery tomorrow to put my port in for chemo. I went and got a wig today because loosing my hair  was the most stressing to my kids. If I can relieve some of their fears I will do anything. They keep it funny thats for sure. Thank you all for your prayers and concern for me. I am so very grateful for each and everyone of you! I will let you know this weekend what happened. Much Love to you all!!!! Kelly
Posts.Title: OMG PLEASE HELP! iamgiggles1 cbm

Posts.Content: Sep 19, 2009 07:15AM iamgiggles1 wrote: Hey all, The Pet/Ct showed nothing WOO HOO! The port is in now and that went Ok. They say I have a T3 -N1- MO. So I am grateful it has not spread from my nodes right? I still dont have the HER report. I meet with my Dr Thusday afternoon so I hope to get more answers. I hope all of you are having a great weekend. I will write again soon. Love to you all...Kelly
Posts.Title: OMG PLEASE HELP! iamgiggles1 cbm

Posts.Content: iamgiggles1 wrote: I have been in limbo for 6 weeks and finally they listened to me and I had a biopsy Thursday. The doctor called yesterday to tell me the mass was positive for IDC. My breast was swollen and my nipple retracted but everyone was saying infection and giving me high doses of antibiotics. I had a mamo and then ultrasound with nothing found but I could feel a mass inside. Come to find out it is over 5cm. How can this happen? My mother and her sister both died of BC so I have always been kinda weary about BC. I meet with my surgeon Monday to get all the details and options. Can anyone tell me what to expect please. I am so grateful for this website!!! You are all my heroes! I have twin 8 year olds and I lost my husband 4 years ago in a car accident so its kinda scary what to tell my kids. I am a fighter and I am getting my boxing gloves on I just need to know as much as possible about this disease. Thank you for listening. Dx 9/11/2009, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 4/12 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: OMG PLEASE HELP! iamgiggles1 cbm

Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2009 06:53AM iamgiggles1 wrote: Thank you so much Lorrie for writing me. I will get all the results Monday I am assuming??? The surgeon just called and told me yesterday that it was positive for IDC and that we would talk all about it at the appt. Will he have all the report do you know?
Posts.Title: OMG PLEASE HELP! iamgiggles1 cbm

Posts.Content: Sep 14, 2009 04:31PM iamgiggles1 wrote: OK here it goes. I see the Oncologist Thursday and do blood work. I go to the hospital to get a port put in Friday and start chemo. They have ordered a petscan for next week. They said they could not stage the cancer untill they get the breast thru mastectomy. All I know is the tumor grade is a 3. My surgeon is presenting my case in front of the board at the hospital Friday. They think it is some part IBC and know it is IDC. Does any of this sound familiar with anybody out there?
Posts.Title: OMG PLEASE HELP! iamgiggles1 cbm

Posts.Content: Sep 13, 2009 06:03AM iamgiggles1 wrote: Thank you everyone for your words of encouragement and hope. Words cannot describe how grateful I am for each and every one of you. I know I will be leaning on you for awhile and it feels good to know I can count on all of you in the trials ahead. Always know that my prayers are with you all also. I will be talking to you tomorrow after my Dr. appt. Lots of Love to you all!!!!
